description:
###Administrative boundaries utilized to conduct Niue 2011 Population and Housing Census  
* Villages

These administrative boundaries have been used to build the Niue PopGIS3 online mapping tool https://niue.popgis.spc.int/. To know more about the PopGIS project please see http://sdd.spc.int/mapping-popgis

###Disclaimer: 
Upper level administrative units may slightly differ from the official boundaries. The boundaries, codes and names shown in the datasets do not imply official endorsement or acceptance by SPC.
name: 2011_Niue_PHC_Admin_Boundaries
